description: These joggers take on any rocky adventure—with water repellency, nylon/spandex for stretch and room to stow essentials, the men's REI Co-op Trailmade joggers are ready for camp and beyond.
name: Trailmade Joggers - Men's

specs.value: Shell: 96% nylon/4% spandex (bluesign® approved); pocket lining: recycled polyester (bluesign® approved)
Contains materials that meet the bluesign® criteria
From a Climate Neutral Certified brand
